I hereby declare that the property in the following schedule is a property in my absolute right of possession and I have constructed an R.C.C. Daba in the said property. Accordingly, the Sri Ainapuram Gram Panchayat has granted a house tax of 206 in my name with assessment no. 199469000802 at door no. 7-. Accordingly, I am the only person to have a special right of possession in the said Daba. I hereby transfer to you the immovable property as per the schedule below, R.C.C. Daba, No. 206, as this Settlement Deed. I hereby declare and assure you that the said property is free and clear from all encumbrances, charges, charges, purchase agreements, society bonds, court seizures, etc., and that no one else has any right or liability over the said property except me, and that I alone am the sole and absolute owner of the said property. I hereby transfer to you this Settlement Deed and hereby transfer to you all the encumbrances, charges, encumbrances, charges, charges, purchase agreements, society bonds, court seizures, etc., and that I shall be the sole and absolute owner of the said property. I hereby declare and assure you that I shall be the sole and absolute owner of the said property, free and clear from all encumbrances, charges, encumbrances, charges, charges, charges, purchase agreements, society bonds, court seizures, etc., and that I shall be the sole and absolute owner of the said property, free and clear from all encumbrances, charges I hereby grant you an unallocated interest. The property is not assigned under the Act No. 9/77.
Declaration
We declare that the property transferred by this deed does not contain any mines, minerals, valuables or anything else. If such things are found to be concealed in this deed, we will be liable to pay depreciation tax.

Declaration of the undersigned
I have furnished all the necessary details like title deeds, tax receipts and government issued identity documents of the property in this document to the undersigned. I hereby declare that I have not transferred/encroached/registered the property in this document to anyone before and that no one else has any right to transfer the said property except me.
This document is being registered in the name of the undersigned.
In relation to this document which is being registered today There can be no relationship or responsibility with the Sub-Registrar, his office staff or the scribe who prepared the draft. The document has been prepared and the registry is going on with the details provided by me. If necessary, I can write and register the amendment / agreement | supplementary documents as an annex to this document without seeking any result from the person who has registered it, without delay. I hereby declare that all the things I have stated are true and I hereby declare that if it is found that there are any untruths in the things I have stated, I will be fully responsible for all legal actions and transactions related to such things. The property described in this document belongs to me alone, I hereby declare that I have not previously transferred the said property to any person and that I shall be liable to the punishment specified in section 82 of the Registration Act, 1908, if I am found to have violated the provisions of section 22 'B' of the Registration Act, 1908. Declaration of the undersigned I have personally read and shown to the experts all the necessary details such as the title deeds, the certificate of conformity and the identity documents of the undersigned and have obtained and registered this deed from the undersigned. Therefore, all the I hereby declare that I am fully responsible for the transactions. Neither the Sub-Registrar, nor the staff of his office nor the draftsman shall have any connection or responsibility with regard to this document prepared and registered today. The document has been prepared and registered with the details furnished by me.
M.-Am Kun

sections.content:
The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 302 of 2026, dated 28/Jan/2026, executed by Moka Satyavathi in favour of her Son, Moka Anjan Kumar towards the property admeasuring an extent of 145.2 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 7-206, Assessment No. 199469000802, comprised in survey number 139/10,  situated in Ainapuram Village & Grama Panchayati, Mummidivaram Mandal, within the District of Konaseema, registered at sub-registrar office Mummidivaram, is bounded as follows:

North by: Site And House Of Mokasaheb
South by: Site And House Of Koram Ramaswamy
East by: Land Of Chintha Tatayya
West by: Dari Margamu, Site Of Rokkala Satyanarayana
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: The EC has been verified and downloaded using the document number parameter, as the option to retrieve EC records using the property address is currently unavailable in the Online EC portal. Therefore, it is advisable for the F.I. to verify the same and proceed as per its internal policy. Further, It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
